com.facebook.react

类 ReactFragmentActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • AppCompatActivity
      • com.facebook.react.ReactActivity
        • com.facebook.react.ReactFragmentActivity
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    DefaultHardwareBackBtnHandler, PermissionAwareActivity
    已过时。 
    ReactFragmentActivity will be removed in 0.59 release. Use ReactActivity instead.

    @Deprecated
public abstract class ReactFragmentActivity
extends ReactActivity
